entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Wind becoming southwest 20 before morning. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 17 February 2023
